title: Tasty Chicken Cakes Recipe
content:
Chicken cakes that taste so delicious with ketchup or mayo. This chicken cake is so easy to make and taste fantastic.

These delicious chicken cakes is super easy to make and taste amazing. You can make this in a few minutes and kids will love this for sure.

 

Chicken Cakes Recipe

 

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 15 mins

Total time: 25 mins

 

Recipe type: Snacks

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Cooked Chicken - 1 cup

Onion - 4 tablespoons chopped finely

Capsicum / Bell Pepper - 4 tablespoons chopped finely

Coriander leaves - 2 tablespoons chopped finely

Mayonnaise - 3 tablespoons

Egg - 1

Breadcrumbs - ½ cup

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Oil - as needed

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients together to a smooth mix.

Heat oil in a pan, add small dollops in and cook till golden brown.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe
recommendations.content:
Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe is one of the easiest and tastiest recipes you could ever make with leftover rice.  You are definitely going to love my schezwan fried rice.
Fried rice is not only delicious to eat but it makes a perfect lunch box recipe too.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
